Headline: #63 63rdTemporary Reroute at 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to fire department activity at 63rd/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at UIC-Halsted. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at UIC-Halsted.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
